cause.description:
I'm walking for 360, a program offered to inner-city students of color interested in journalism. We need to diversify the newsrooms! Join us in the walk: http://walkforjustice.kintera.org/faf/search/searchTeamPart.asp?ievent=226647&lis=0&kntae226647=628043164E604EE5A4CD78E328BF1498&team=1969687&tlteam=1969686
or pledge a few bucks toward our team: https://www.kintera.org/faf/donorReg/donorPledge.asp?ievent=226647&lis=0&kntae226647=628043164E604EE5A4CD78E328BF1498&supId=0&team=1969687
1. WE NEED TO DIVERSIFY OUR NEWSROOMS!!
cause.mission: Come walk for justice, proceeds go to MN non-profits
cause.name: Walk for Justice
